column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=I ordered my train tickets a couple days before after planning to meet up with family .
#id=2
#text=I had them printed out and ready to use .
#id=3
#text=After doing the standard morning routines , we finally arrived at train station about half an hour early to make sure that we got there in time .
#id=4
#text=We approached the clerk desk to get confirmation about the train .
#id=5
#text=After about half an hour later , the train arrived very shortly after we sat down .
#id=6
#text=We both showed the tickets to the employee , and then got on the train .
#id=7
#text=We both got seated into our seats with our luggage being handled .
#id=8
#text=It did not take for the train to take off , and we were on our way .
#id=9
#text=While the train ride was pretty uncomfortable , the sights was enjoyable .
#text=The ride took about a couple hours until we arrived at our destination .
#text=We both got our luggage and got off the train .
